SYSTEM.system_blacklist_attempt: Blacklisted id {userid} attempted to friend the bot.

ERRORS.err_cant_broadcast: You can only broadcast every 10 minutes.

help_message: I'm BotTom, here to help with your every day Dota!

CMD_HELP.lfg: Alert my friends that you are looking to play.
CMD_HELP.inhouse: Alert my friends that you are hosting an inhouse. You can also provide a password.
CMD_HELP.ping: PONG! I'll tell you your Steam ID.
CMD_HELP.whois: Look up a user by their full name or a part of their name.

LFG_RESPONSES.lfg_response_sender: I alerted my friends that you wish to play.

INHOUSE_RESPONSES.inhouse_response_sender: I alerted my friends that you are hosting an inhouse.

mute_response: Okay, broadcasts will no longer reach you until you unmute me.
unmute_response: Okay, broadcasts will now reach you.

ADMIN.lookup_error: No known friend with that ID.
ADMIN.no_inactive_users: No users on this bot are inactive!
ADMIN.blacklist_remove: Removed the user from the blacklist

random_responses: Not a clue what you want.

DOTA2_CMDS_HELP.lobby: Returns the number of players in a lobby, and a lobby invite if there are empty slots
